{{< include macros.qmd >}}

:::{.callout-note}

**In order to interpret $\beta_j$**,
differentiate or difference $\red{\eta(\vx)}$ with respect to $\red{x_j}$:

$$\deriv{\red{x_j}} \red{\eta(\vx)}$$

**In order to find the MLE $\hat{\vb}$**,
differentiate the log-likelihood function $\blue{\llik(\vb)}$ 
with respect to $\blue{\vb}$:

$$\deriv{\blue{\vb}} \blue{\llik(\vb)}$$

:::
